subject: Radio
lead_paragraph: Pacman Jones went on Michael Irvin’s radio show and spoke about the Tennessee Titans in the past tense. Equal parts contrite and defiant in discussing his six arrests since being drafted three years ago, he said he wanted to be a Cowboy and expressed confidence that Commissioner Roger Goodell would reinstate him.
